messages.title: A Fairer Society
messages.content: This isn't who'll be standing against the Conservative Helen Grant to be your MP here in Maidstone and The Weald. No, our party comes in disguise, in red and in the local elections, we beat the Conservatives by 6% across the county.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to keep VAT on pub meals and renovations in the single market place.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In the crucial elections next year by spending a couple of minutes today to fill in the postal vote form and returning it in the envelope provided.

issues.brexitEurope: Fight to keep VAT on pub meals and renovations in the single market place.
issues.economy: Prudent economic policies, as evidence by winning in the local elections where the budget was balanced.

leaflet.personalStatement: My passion for public service is why I left a job editing national newspapers to stand for parliament. The moment to act is now - your chance to make a difference. Not just because you are appalled at the waste Labour and the Conservatives have presided over: the dismantling of our hospitals; the neglect of our schools and the sheer pointless bureaucracy they have inflicted on every walk of life.

politicalExperience.achievements: Left the job to stand for parliament

leaflet.additionalNotes: The Conservatives are looking to total our gains with 18,600 phantom votes; invisible, we are told: no MP ever sees people to persuade at the house up that unlit lane.
